commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I got all my clothes, my wallet, remembered to buy souvenirs. What's left? Oh yeah, my phone charger!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (So much happened in Numazu.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I only came to ask Aqours a few questions, but then the festival and the typhoon happened. It was a busy few days, but so much fun.)

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Did you get all your stuff together?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey Chika. Yeah, I got everything.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You didn't forget anything, did you? Sometimes guests leave their watches or phones, or even their house keys.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nope, all good! My watch is on my arm, phone in my pocket, and my mom should be at home waiting for me, so I don't even have my keys.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What if your mom is out when you get home?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh. I guess I'd wait at Ayumu's house then.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle* That's your childhood friend who lives in the same complex, right? It must be nice having someone to rely on live so close to you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Chuckle* It is.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You helped me out a lot, too. It's almost become like my second home. I feel kind of sad leaving this place.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm sad, too. You've become almost like family while you stayed here.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Checking out?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yes, please.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Hello.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, it's Riko!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: *Giggle* I decided to stop by. Going back to Tokyo?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. I'm taking the bus to the station pretty soon.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hey, I'll go with you to the station.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Can I come?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you guys sure?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Of course! I was planning on doing this anyway.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Heeeey!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey everyone!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I came to see you off because I heard you were leaving for Tokyo.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: You're really going back. I'll miss you.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I wanted to talk with you so much more, zura.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It feels like we've been living together in Numazu for years, so it's strange thinking that you're going to be leaving.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone, thank you all for everything. You all welcomed me into your circle, even though you didn't know me.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Lift your head up. We should be the ones thanking you.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: That's right. You helped us with the festival and even with writing the song. You saved our skin.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: We were able to make such great memories because you were here.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thank you for coming to Numazu and liking us so much.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You said we were shining, but what about you? Did you find your way to shine?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, I'm not quite sure about my way yet. I'll find it eventually though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then, with our own way to shine in our hearts, we'll take on the School Idol Festival stage!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Giggle* You have some guts to say that! I'm looking forward to it.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Nijigasaki is going to be a formidable foe.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, be ready for us! If you take us lightly because we're newbies, we'll rip the carpet out from under your feet!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Is that a declaration of war?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You bet!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh, the audacity of you to say such bold things before the likes of Yohane! A bold little demon you are.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: So you ended up being a little demon after all, zura.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Now that the Summer Festival is over, it's time to get down to practice for the School Idol Festival so Nijigasaki doesn't beat us!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We'll meet again. Next time it'll be on the stage of our dreams!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, see you guys again!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: After seeing 's and Aqours' collab live show, my black and white world was brought to life in vivid color.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Like the sun, a jewel, or a rainbow after a storm, the school idols shone so brilliantly.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How do their songs grasp the hearts of the people so firmly? I needed to know the answer, so I came "here."

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone in Aqours was so unique and interesting, and just like me and my friends, they really loved school idols.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Young girls that just want to work hard to make people happy with their songs.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Maybe that's why people are so touched by their music. They are driven to follow the music of miracles these girls produce.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A formidable foe, huh. We've gotta work hard so we really are.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm glad I met the members of Aqours. This experience will definitely help me write a new song.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, time to go see 's! If I can find out what their charm is, I'll be able to grow even more!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I might not see them if I just show up out of the blue though. I got lucky with Aqours, but this time I should plan ahead.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Maybe call in advance? That makes me so nervous though. It'd be great if they had an event where I could meet them. I should look up to see if they do.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hmm. Of course nothing that convenient would be going on. Hm?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wh-What is this?!
